item.title: 【All About GPU Threads, Warps, and Wavefronts】所有关于GPU线程，扭曲和波前的信息
item.description:
【

On a GPU, the threads are always run as a group of threads called warps. In that sense, the granularity of thread execution is always 32 (or 64, as explained later) on GPU. If a user requests for one thread, that one thread in the warp acts as an active thread while the rest of the threads are inactive. It is not conventional to request a single thread in GPU programming.

The threads inside the warp run in parallel (and not concurrent) and execute the instructions in a SIMD (Single Instruction Multiple Data) fashion. 

】

在GPU上，这些线程始终以一组称为WARPS的线程运行。从这个意义上讲，在GPU上，线程执行的粒度始终为32（或64个，如稍后所述）。如果用户请求一个线程，则经纱中的一个线程充当一个活动线程，而其余的线程则不活动。 它是 不是常规 请求GPU编程中的单个线程

经纱内的线程并行运行（而不是并发），并以SIMD（单个指令多个数据）方式执行指令。

item.title: 【Migrating From SQLite to MySQL】从sqlite迁移到mysql
item.description:
【

Introducing SQLite

SQLite is a kind of open-source RDBMS that is distinguished from most other database management systems built on a client-server model since it is a server-less embedded database. This means that the SQLite database runs within the software that accesses the data, eliminating the need for a separate server. Due to such architecture, SQLite is a highly reliable, efficient system that works perfectly in low-memory environments.

One of the major benefits of SQLite is its cross-platform compatibility, allowing it to run on various modern OS. As an RDBMS contained within a C library, SQLite can be utilized by applications written in any programming language that can connect to external libraries written in C. For example, it is ideal for developing embedded software in digital devices, such as mobile phones, game consoles, cameras, and set-top boxes. Additionally, SQLite can serve as a temporary dataset for applications to process data.

】

介绍sqlite

sqlite是一种开源RDBMS，它与构建在客户端服务器模型上的大多数其他数据库管理系统区别，因为它是一个无服务器的嵌入式数据库。这意味着SQLite数据库在访问数据的软件中运行，从而消除了对单独服务器的需求。由于这种架构，SQLite是一个高度可靠，高效的系统，在低内存环境中完美工作。

sqlite 是其跨平台兼容性，可以在各种现代OS上运行。作为C库中包含的RDBM，可以通过使用任何编程语言编写的应用程序来使用SQLite，该应用程序可以连接到C中编写的外部库。例如，它非常适合在数字设备中开发嵌入式软件，例如手机，游戏机，摄像机，摄像头和设定盒。此外，SQLite可以用作处理数据的应用程序的临时数据集。
